title: An absolute star.
body:
We bought an Arthur  Bell floribunda from you a year ago. This was its first real summer and I expected a few flowers. Well! It has actually been flowering for weeks and has had at least 14 flowers so far with more buds still appearing.
We have always admired the quality of any roses from you but this has been over and above our expectations. Thankyou so much. We will be back for more!
